primaryaddr.description: Configure primary DNS IP address. In particular, 0.0.0.0 cannot be configured, but 0.0.0.0 may be obtained.

secondaryaddr.description: Configure secondary DNS IP address. In particular, 0.0.0.0 cannot be configured, but 0.0.0.0 may be obtained.
